title: Graham Kerr (rugby union)
text:
Graham Kerr was a <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a> international <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He played as a <a href="Forward%20%28rugby%20union%29">Forward</a>.
Rugby Union career.
Amateur career.
He played for Old Dunelmians in Durham and <a href="Edinburgh%20Wanderers">Edinburgh Wanderers</a>.
Provincial career.
Kerr played for the <a href="Scottish%20Exiles%20%28rugby%20union%29">Anglo-Scots</a> in <a href="1898%E2%80%9399%20Scottish%20Districts%20season">1898</a>.
International career.
He was capped 8 times for <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Scotland</a> from 1898 to 1900.
